These photos were taken by Cindy Everitt at the 1998 alumni gathering.

Previous Next

The following photos taken on August 15-16, 1997 by David Simmons are from the first alumni gathering. Events included gathering on Peyton lawn with music, a free Marriott meal, an Alumni Association meeting, and an afternoon outing at Lake Lowndes.

A photo of the Hooper lobby taken from the stairs.
A handful of people showed up on time for the 10:00AM alumni meeting. More strolled in over the next 40 minutes.
The first meeting of the newly elected Alumni Association board in a hallway of Parkinson Hall.
Saturday afternoon at a Lake Lowndes Pavillion
A group of alumni gather around a picnic table in the shade to reminisce.
Previous Next
